attributes.action: Start Juicing in Hospitals Schools and all Government Services and have a healthier Nation
attributes.additional_details: Dear Sir/Madam my name is Andy Morris for 13 years I was on approx 52 tablets a day and was dying a very slow painful Death after being chosen to try a change of Diet after 28days there was a massive turnaround in my Health and it is not just me these stories are happening all the time. All over the world when we realise it and enhance it we will save Billions of Pounds in Healthcare as well as having a very healthy nation
